name: Empire Invaders
description:
THIS IS A FAN-GAME, SO IT SHOULD NOT BE SOLD!
This game was made using Game Editor (game-editor.com/Main_Page)

EMPIRE INVADERS (2.0):
Game by: Pedro Vianna (@PviannaKC)
Music by: FFY5 (https://ffyae5.bandcamp.com/releases)

DESCRIPTION:
A long time ago, in a galaxy far, far away....
EMPIRE INVADERS is a Endless-Space-Shooter based on Star Wars spaceships.
Destroy all imperial ships or be destroyed!

CONTROLS:
(Use your controller with JoyToKey)
ARROW KEYS - Moves the player
Z - Shoot

ENEMIES:
-TIE FIGHTER-
HP=3
DAMAGE=1
SPEED=3

-TIE INTERCEPTOR-
HP=2
DAMAGE=1
SPEED=7

-TIE BOMBER-
HP=5
DAMAGE=2
SPEED=2
